mapper.select: with study_tmp as ( SELECT sabun, cast(date_format(startdt, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) as char) as startdt, studytype, (SELECT NM FROM auth WHERE AUTHCD = t1.authcd) as authcd, enddt, score, middt FROM study t1 WHERE studytype = 'D' AND score is not null AND enddt = (select max(enddt) from study where sabun = #{userId} and studytype = 'D') UNION ALL SELECT sabun, cast(date_format(startdt, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) as char) as startdt, studytype, (SELECT NM FROM auth WHERE AUTHCD = t1.authcd) as authcd, enddt, score, middt FROM study t1 WHERE studytype = 'G' AND score is not null AND enddt = (select max(enddt) from study where sabun = #{userId} and studytype = 'G') UNION ALL SELECT sabun, cast(date_format(startdt, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) as char) as startdt, studytype, (SELECT NM FROM auth WHERE AUTHCD = t1.authcd) as authcd, enddt, score, middt FROM study t1 WHERE studytype = 'T' AND score is not null AND enddt = (select max(enddt) from study where sabun = #{userId} and studytype = 'T') ) select t1.sabun, t1.startdt, t1.studytype, t1.authcd, t1.enddt, t1.score from study_tmp t1 where 1=1 and t1.studytype IN ('D','G','T') union select ifnull(t1.sabun, '-'), ifnull(t1.startdt, '-'), ifnull(t1.studytype, 'D'), ifnull(t1.authcd, '-'), ifnull(t1.enddt, '-'), ifnull(t1.score, '-') from (select null) t2 left outer join study_tmp t1 on t1.studytype IN ('D') and t1.score is not null union select ifnull(t1.sabun, '-'), ifnull(t1.startdt, '-'), ifnull(t1.studytype, 'G'), ifnull(t1.authcd, '-'), ifnull(t1.enddt, '-'), ifnull(t1.score, '-') from (select null) t2 left outer join study_tmp t1 on t1.studytype IN ('G') and t1.score is not null union select ifnull(t1.sabun, '-'), ifnull(t1.startdt, '-'), ifnull(t1.studytype, 'T'), ifnull(t1.authcd, '-'), ifnull(t1.enddt, '-'), ifnull(t1.score, '-') from (select null) t2 left outer join study_tmp t1 on t1.studytype IN ('T') and t1.score is not null ORDER BY FIELD(studytype,'D','G','T');
